nodes.text: Llitishi was a Wroonian male who was the leader of one of the Cestus Cybernetics Families during the Clone Wars. His particular family was descended from the son of a murderer and the daughter of an ore miner.

Around 22 BBY, Jedi Knight Obi-Wan Kenobi and the Vippit Doolb Snoil managed to make the Regent give up trusting the Families. Finally, the Republic cruiser Nexu bombed the bunker where Llitishi and many members of the Five Families were killed in the blast.
